New Records: Anthony Edwards scored 37 points with 9 3-pointers, one short of his career high
Key Match Events: Minnesota Timberwolves dominated the Portland Trail Blazers from the start
The Blazers were held scoreless for the first 5:12 of the game
Others: Rudy Gobert had 8 points, 15 rebounds and 3 blocks for Minnesota
Scoot Henderson led the Blazers with 16 points
Anfernee Simons had 14 and Robert Williams III added 13 points for Portland
